main.name: Calum Bradley
main.description: Web development engineer skilled in React and Node JS.
main.bio: Experienced developer with a history of working in the financial services industry, skilled in RBDMS including the management of enterprise scale data driven applications and ETL's using .NET
main.contactmessage: Lets stay in touch, feel free to contact me below

education.description: 3 A Levels – Art/Graphics, Business studies & Information Technology, 1 AS level – General studies.
10 GCSEs - Grades A - C - Sandbach School

work.title: Platform Engineer
work.description: Management & engineering of a large scale data-driven application architecture utilising .Net and SQL server, full-stack development responsible for change management, bug fixes and version control, achievements include implementing a user landing page and managing ETL performance, monitoring and alerting on application errors. Problem identification owning and driving hot-fixes into implementation using applicable frameworks and service management techniques. Maintenance and incident management with REST API’s critical to service stability.

work.title: Product Specialist
work.description: Managing queries with; SWIFT, H2H XML file support, API solutions, certificate issues, international payments. Deliver high quality projects, onboarding registrations and focusing on high quality implementation for H2H corporates. Conduct usability testing, constructing test implementation plans and translating insights into workable solutions for system releases. Collaborate with product managers and engineering teams.
